overview: What drives a man to cheat? Lust? Revenge? Opportunity? Maybe it's better to ask what doesn't? NakedSword knows that sex is best when there's a little excitement -- and "Cheaters," a NakedSword Originals production features four hot, clandestine tales of sex-on-the-side. Scandal-filled scenes of raw betrayal that threatens to rip apart the picket fences of four San Francisco couples. We know we shouldn't -- but when the sex is this hot, it's hard to say no! Besides, it's not cheating if you don't get caught, right?
title: Cheaters
